name: MFlow - Connect The Superheroes for Marvels
name_original: MFlow - Connect The Superheroes for Marvels
description:
Do you love our Marvel Superheroes? So do we :)
Connect superheroes pairs to create a flow throughout 700 different unique play levels or race against clock to solve the puzzle. But watch out the flow will break if two superheroes lap over each other.

This is also a great game for kids as they develop cognitive skills while playing this game and solve the puzzle to connect the superheroes as the difficulty level goes up. Adults will have as much fun playing this game and is a great fun when you have few seconds to solve the puzzle. Download this game for free today and let the fun begin. Our game also includes following features:

- Unlock hints for a puzzle
- Skip to next level
- Number of moves and best moves for each level
- Cute and Nice graphics
- Keeps kids and adult entertained
- Fun, Fun and Fun
